text.content: Alpk√ºche The painting Alp kitchen by Ernst Ludwig Kirchner was created in 1918 in Switzerland and shows the small kitchen of a mountain hut on Stafelalp (1900 m.a.s.), above Davos Frauenkirche, where the artist lived for a time. The house is still in almost original condition today. The painting is from the Kirchner estate and is now in the collection of the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum in Madrid.
